titleStmt.title: A sermon of judgement, preached before the Queen Dowager in Her Majesties chappel at Somerset-House, on the first Sunday in Advent, being the 27th. of Novemb. 1686 / by J.D. of the Society of Jesus.
titleStmt.author: J. D. (John Dormer), 1636-1700.
